title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: For auction are 5x Cardsmiths Currency Series 1 base card setsMore information can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406560.0***Bids will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous multi-item auctions. Place the number of items you want to bid on and then the bid per item:     1 @ xx btc, 2 @ xx btc, etc...***STARTING BID PER SET: 0.0100BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER SET: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 22nd, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: sweeteye on September 21, 2022, 09:41:47 PM1 @ .01Winner
